message: I'm excited to sell you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice! However, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm happy to pay $100 for the product, as that's my maximum budget.
I understand you have a budget constraint, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a price that's closer to your budget, but still reflects the value of the product.
